verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Maskil of the sons of Korah.) O God, <WH430> we have heard <WH8085> with our ears, <WH241> Our fathers have told <WH1> us, The work <WH5608> that Thou didst <WH6467> in their days, <WH6466> In the days <WH3117> of old. <WH3117>

Thou with Thine own hand <WH3027> didst drive <WH3423> out the nations; <WH1471> Then Thou didst plant <WH5193> them; Thou didst afflict <WH7489> the peoples, <WH3816> Then Thou didst spread <WH7971> them abroad.

For by their own sword <WH2719> they did not possess <WH3423> the land; <WH776> And their own arm <WH2220> did not save <WH3467> them; But Thy right <WH3225> hand, <WH3225> and Thine arm, <WH2220> and the light <WH216> of Thy presence, <WH6440> For Thou didst favor <WH7521> them.
Thou art my King, <WH4428> O God; <WH430> Command <WH6680> victories <WH3444> for Jacob. <WH3290>
Through Thee we will push <WH5055> back <WH5055> our adversaries; <WH6862> Through Thy name <WH8034> we will trample <WH947> down <WH947> those who rise <WH6965> up against us.
For I will not trust <WH982> in my bow, <WH7198> Nor <WH3808> will my sword <WH2719> save <WH3467> me.
But Thou hast saved <WH3467> us from our adversaries, <WH6862> And Thou hast put <WH954> to shame <WH954> those who hate <WH8130> us.
In God <WH430> we have boasted <WH1984> all <WH3605> day <WH3117> long, And we will give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to Thy name <WH8034> forever. <WH5769> Selah. <WH5542>
Yet <WH637> Thou hast rejected <WH2186> [us] and brought <WH3637> us to dishonor, <WH3637> And dost not go <WH3318> out with our armies. <WH6635>
Thou dost cause us to turn <WH7725> back <WH268> from the adversary; <WH6862> And those who hate <WH8130> us have taken <WH8154> spoil <WH8154> for themselves.
Thou dost give <WH5414> us as sheep <WH6629> to be eaten, <WH3978> And hast scattered <WH2219> us among the nations. <WH1471>
Thou dost sell <WH4376> Thy people <WH5971> cheaply, <WH3808> <WH1952> And hast not profited <WH7235> by their sale. <WH4242>
Thou dost make <WH7760> us a reproach <WH2781> to our neighbors, <WH7934> A scoffing <WH3933> and a derision <WH7047> to those around <WH5439> us.
Thou dost make <WH7760> us a byword <WH4912> among the nations, <WH1471> A laughingstock <WH4493> <WH7218> among the peoples. <WH3816>
All <WH3605> day <WH3117> long my dishonor <WH3639> is before <WH5048> me, And my humiliation <WH1322> <WH6440> has overwhelmed <WH3680> me,
Because <WH4480> of the voice <WH6963> of him who reproaches <WH2778> and reviles, <WH1442> Because <WH4480> of the presence <WH6440> of the enemy <WH340> and the avenger. <WH5358>
All <WH3605> this <WH384> has come <WH935> upon us, but we have not forgotten <WH7911> Thee, And we have not dealt <WH8266> falsely <WH8266> with Thy covenant. <WH1285>
Our heart <WH3820> has not turned <WH5472> back, <WH268> And our steps <WH9036> have not deviated <WH5186> from Thy way, <WH734>
Yet <WH3588> Thou hast crushed <WH1794> us in a place <WH4725> of jackals, <WH8565> And covered <WH3680> us with the shadow <WH6757> of death. <WH6757>
If <WH518> we had forgotten <WH7911> the name <WH8034> of our God, <WH430> Or extended <WH6566> our hands <WH3709> to a strange <WH2114> god; <WH410>
Would not God <WH430> find <WH2713> this <WH384> out? For He knows <WH3045> the secrets <WH8587> of the heart. <WH3820>
But for Thy sake <WH5921> we are killed <WH2026> all <WH3605> day <WH3117> long; We are considered <WH2803> as sheep <WH6629> to be slaughtered. <WH2878>
Arouse <WH5782> Thyself, why <WH4100> dost Thou sleep, <WH3462> O Lord <WH136>? Awake, <WH9516> do not reject <WH2186> us forever. <WH5331>
Why <WH4100> dost Thou hide <WH5641> Thy face, <WH6440> And forget <WH7911> our affliction <WH6040> and our oppression <WH3906>?
For our soul <WH5315> has sunk <WH7743> down <WH7743> into the dust; <WH6083> Our body <WH990> cleaves <WH1692> to the earth. <WH776>
Rise <WH6965> up, be our help, <WH5833> And redeem <WH6299> us for the sake <WH4616> of Thy lovingkindness. <WH2617>
